On Tue, Aug 5, 2025 at 1:48 PM Design Team <support@paytm-designocl.freshdesk.com> wrote:
Dear Aakanksha Ohri,

We would like to acknowledge that we have received your request and a ticket has been created.
A support representative will be reviewing your request and will send you a personal response.(usually within 24 hours).

To view the status of the ticket or add comments, please visit
https://paytm-designocl.freshdesk.com/helpdesk/tickets/26560

Thank you for your patience.

Sincerely,
Design Team _ Brand Marketing Support Team

conversations.body_text:
Hi Narendra,


This version still has some issues :
1. Page 3-  Numbering does not match the arrow pointing at the pictorial
representation.
2.  Page 4, Point 6-  full stop( poornaviram) is missing in the first line
of the point.
3. Page 5-  last Point- '.' is not used in Hindi. pls replace with
poornaviram
4. Page 6- spelling of dikhata hai to be corrected in point 3.
5. Pls check the QR at the last page. I can still see the border lines at 2
sides of the QR.

Thanks and Regards,

*Aakanksha Ohri*

*Paytm for Business*

+91 9711741358

[image: Inline image 1]

www.paytm.com

conversations.body:
Hi Narendra,


This version still has some issues :
1. Page 3-  Numbering does not match the arrow pointing at the pictorial representation.
2.  Page 4, Point 6-  full stop( poornaviram) is missing in the first line of the point.
3. Page 5-  last Point- '.' is not used in Hindi. pls replace with poornaviram
4. Page 6- spelling of dikhata hai to be corrected in point 3.
5. Pls check the QR at the last page. I can still see the border lines at 2 sides of the QR.
Thanks and Regards,
Aakanksha Ohri
Paytm for Business
+91 9711741358
www.paytm.com

Narendra
